generation.key: Name Type Cat. Power Acc. PP Effect

move.name: Acid Spray
move.desc: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Acrobatics
move.desc: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

move.name: After You
move.desc: Gives target priority in the next turn.

move.name: Ally Switch
move.desc: User switches with opposite teammate.

move.name: Autotomize
move.desc: Reduces weight and sharply raises Speed.

move.name: Bestow
move.desc: Gives the user's held item to the target.

move.name: Blue Flare
move.desc: May burn opponent.

move.name: Bolt Strike
move.desc: May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Bulldoze
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Speed.

move.name: Chip Away
move.desc: Ignores opponent's stat changes.

move.name: Circle Throw
move.desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Clear Smog
move.desc: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

move.name: Coil
move.desc: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

move.name: Cotton Guard
move.desc: Drastically raises user's Defense.

move.name: Dragon Tail
move.desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Drill Run
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Dual Chop
move.desc: Hits twice in one turn.

move.name: Echoed Voice
move.desc: Power increases each turn.

move.name: Electro Ball
move.desc: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Electroweb
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Speed.

move.name: Entrainment
move.desc: Makes target's ability same as user's.

move.name: Fiery Dance
move.desc: May raise user's Special Attack.

move.name: Final Gambit
move.desc: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

move.name: Fire Pledge
move.desc: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

move.name: Flame Burst
move.desc: May also injure nearby Pokémon.

move.name: Flame Charge
move.desc: Raises user's Speed.

move.name: Foul Play
move.desc: Uses the opponent's Attack stat.

move.name: Freeze Shock
move.desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Frost Breath
move.desc: Always results in a critical hit.

move.name: Fusion Bolt
move.desc: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

move.name: Fusion Flare
move.desc: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

move.name: Gear Grind
move.desc: Hits twice in one turn.

move.name: Glaciate
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Speed.

move.name: Grass Pledge
move.desc: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

move.name: Guard Split
move.desc: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

move.name: Head Charge
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Heal Pulse
move.desc: Restores half the target's max HP.

move.name: Heart Stamp
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Heat Crash
move.desc: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Heavy Slam
move.desc: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Hex
move.desc: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

move.name: Hone Claws
move.desc: Raises user's Attack and Accuracy.

move.name: Horn Leech
move.desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Hurricane
move.desc: May confuse opponent.

move.name: Ice Burn
move.desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

move.name: Icicle Crash
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Incinerate
move.desc: Destroys the target's held berry.

move.name: Inferno
move.desc: Burns opponent.

move.name: Leaf Tornado
move.desc: May lower opponent's Accuracy.

move.name: Low Sweep
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Speed.

move.name: Magic Room
move.desc: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

move.name: Night Daze
move.desc: May lower opponent's Accuracy.

move.name: Power Split
move.desc: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

move.name: Psyshock
move.desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Psystrike
move.desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Quash
move.desc: Makes the target act last this turn.

move.name: Quick Guard
move.desc: Protects the user's team from high-priority moves.

move.name: Quiver Dance
move.desc: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

move.name: Rage Powder
move.desc: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

move.name: Razor Shell
move.desc: May lower opponent's Defense.

move.name: Reflect Type
move.desc: User becomes the target's type.

move.name: Relic Song
move.desc: May put the target to sleep.

move.name: Retaliate
move.desc: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

move.name: Round
move.desc: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

move.name: Sacred Sword
move.desc: Ignores opponent's stat changes.

move.name: Scald
move.desc: May burn opponent.

move.name: Searing Shot
move.desc: May burn opponent.

move.name: Secret Sword
move.desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Shell Smash
move.desc: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Shift Gear
move.desc: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

move.name: Simple Beam
move.desc: Changes target's ability to Simple.

move.name: Sky Drop
move.desc: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

move.name: Sludge Wave
move.desc: May poison opponent.

move.name: Smack Down
move.desc: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

move.name: Snarl
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Soak
move.desc: Changes the target's type to water.

move.name: Steamroller
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Stored Power
move.desc: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

move.name: Storm Throw
move.desc: Always results in a critical hit.

move.name: Struggle Bug
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Synchronoise
move.desc: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

move.name: Tail Slap
move.desc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

move.name: Techno Blast
move.desc: Type depends on the Drive being held.

move.name: Telekinesis
move.desc: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

move.name: V-create
move.desc: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

move.name: Venoshock
move.desc: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

move.name: Volt Switch
move.desc: User must switch out after attacking.

move.name: Water Pledge
move.desc: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

move.name: Wide Guard
move.desc: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

move.name: Wild Charge
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Wonder Room
move.desc: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

move.name: Work Up
move.desc: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.
